quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
We live in a dark and romantic and quite tragic world.
There are two ways to live a life either forget everything or, remember nothing.
A woman's happiness is in throwing everything away to live for love.
We live and we die and anything else is just a delusion.
If you live each day as if it were your last, someday you'll be right.

The best way to be appreciative for your life is to live it; don't die for any other reason but love. Dreams are what guide us, art is what defines us, math is makes it all possible, and love is what lights our way.
Don't live to be judged for what you haven't done. Live to be judged for what you have done.
Live alone if staying together seems lifeless.
Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.

Life and love are life and love, a bunch of violets is a bunch of violets, and to drag in the idea of a point is to ruin everything. Live and let live, love and let love, flower and fade, and follow the natural curve, which flows on, pointless.
The attitude is we live and let live. This is actually an amazing change in values in a rather short time and it's an example of freedom from religion.
We have to live and let live in order to create what we are.
My core beliefs revolve around the idea that we should live to the best of our abilities-we should live and let live.
When you were young, and your heart, was an open book. You used to say, live and let live.
A man who flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a shortcut to meet it.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Live every day as if it were your last and then some day you'll be right.
Live as if your were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
Eventually all things fall into place. Until then, laugh at the confusion, live for the moments, and know everything happens for a reason.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work and learning from failure.
If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
I do not ask for faith in a hereafter, but let me believe in today, and no hereafter can present that I shall not be well prepared.
